adventurous: Heads out of Clan territories to look for new herbs
altruistic: Declines to eat when prey is low
ambitious: Insists on taking on more tasks
bloodthirsty: Has been disappearing a lot lately
Insists only on treating cats who need it
Is ripping some leaves to shreds
Gives the wrong herbs to a warrior on purpose
bold: Decides to try a new herb as treatment for an injury
calm: Stays composed when treating a severe injury
careful: Counts and recounts the poppy seeds
charismatic: Is doing their daily checkup on the elders
childish: Bounces excitedly at the half-moon meeting
cold: Refuses to treat an injured, abandoned kit
compassionate: Works long into the night taking care of the Clan
confident: Is proud of their ability to care for their Clanmates
daring: Steals catmint from a Twoleg garden
empathetic: Listens to the apprentices complain about their training
faithful: Has been hearing the voices of StarClan cats...
fierce: Insists on joining battle training once a moon
insecure: Is saying that they don't deserve their full name
lonesome: Is wishing they could have a mate and kits
Wishes their Clanmates could understand their struggles
loyal: Refuses to share gossip at the half-moon meeting
Refuses to give another Clan's medicine cat some herbs
nervous: Recounts the amount of catmint in their stores
patient: Helps a warrior regain their strength
playful: Excitedly teaches the kits about basic herbs
responsible: Ensures that all of their duties are taken care of
righteous: Gives herbs to an injured loner
sneaky: Seems to be hiding something in the medicine they give to the leader
strange: Insists everyone eat chamomile leaves everyday at moonhigh
Sleeps in the middle of the clearing
strict: Forbids anyone from disturbing them when working
thoughtful: Realizes what an omen might mean
vengeful: Refuses to treat a cat that once bullied them
wise: Tells an ancient tale about StarClan
